feed.title: UBC Envision
feed.subtitle: UBC Envision: The UBC AIChE Student Chapter

entry.title: Envision hosts brewing workshop at the AIChE 2017 Conference

link.title: Envision hosts brewing workshop at the AIChE 2017 Conference

entry.content:
What’s Brewing in Minneapolis?

Thanos, Siang, Josh and Shams represented UBC Envision at the 2017 AIChE Student Meeting in Minneapolis. Their workshop on IoT for automated beer brewing went really well, with a large room full of excited students interested in learning more about setting up their own brewing project in their AIChE chapters.

Workshop contents are available here.
entry.summary: What’s Brewing in Minneapolis? Thanos, Siang, Josh and Shams represented UBC Envision at the 2017 AIChE Student Meeting in Minneapolis. Their workshop on IoT for automated beer brewing went really well, with a large room full of excited students interested in learning more about setting up their own brewing project in their AIChE chapters.

entry.title: 1st Place for Chem-E-Quiz in Barcelona
entry.content:
10th World Congress of Chemical Engineering

Thanos, Siang, Kyle, Mani, Ray and Ngai To competed in the Chem-E-Car competition for the 10th World Congress of Chemical Engineering in Barcelona.

Haider, Mani, Thanos, Siang and Ray received first place for the Chemical Engineering quiz competition and a 750 Euro prize.
entry.summary: 10th World Congress of Chemical Engineering Thanos, Siang, Kyle, Mani, Ray and Ngai To competed in the Chem-E-Car competition for the 10th World Congress of Chemical Engineering in Barcelona.
